Specification.Comments: Big Red is a sample ADT Update patient message profile

Conformance.StaticID: {ConfSig(1) hl7(113883)(1) 2.3.1(6) static-profile(1) ADT(3) A08(8) null(0) ADT_A01(3) 1.0(1) Sender(1)}

Field.Name: Message Type
Field.ImpNote: Contains HL7 trigger event.

Field.Name: Message Control ID
Field.ImpNote: Generated unique id

Field.Name: Event Type Code
Field.ImpNote: Contains HL7 trigger event.

Field.Name: Event Reason Code
Field.ImpNote:
Contains the name of the BIG RED
transaction that caused the trigger event to
be generated

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Event Occurred
Field.ImpNote: Only filled in on transfer

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Identifier List
Field.ImpNote:
BIG RED sends the MRN as the first
iteration. For systems using BIG RED
EMPI, the MPI number is sent as the
second iteration.
Hospital MRN^^^Hospital Code~
Enterprise MPI^^^"MPI"

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Name
Field.ImpNote:
BIG RED edits Patient Names requiring
them to have a comma and a space after
the last name and before the start of the first
name.

Field.Name: Date/Time Of Birth
Field.ImpNote: YYYYMMDD

Field.Name: Sex
Field.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Sex Table

Field.Name: Race
Field.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Race Table

Field.Name: Patient Address
Field.ImpNote:
Maps to BIG RED state table Maps to BIG
RED country table

Field.Name: Phone Number - Home
Field.ImpNote:
(NNN)NNN-NNNN
up to 3 repetitions

Field.Name: Phone Number - Business
Field.ImpNote: (NNN)NNN-NNNN

Component.Name: identifier
Component.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Language table

Field.Name: Patient Account Number
Field.ImpNote:
Required on all transactions except A31,
A40, and A47.

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Birth Order
Field.Predicate: Valued only if pid.24 is true

Segment.Name: NK1
Segment.ImpNote:
Contains emergency contacts. At least one
is required. Maximum 6.
Segment.Description: next of kin / associated parties segment-

Field.Name: Name
Field.ImpNote: Same format as Patient name.

Field.Name: Relationship
Field.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Relationship table

Field.Name: Address
Field.ImpNote: Same format as PID address

Field.Name: Phone Number
Field.ImpNote: Same format as PID phone

Field.Name: Business Phone Number
Field.ImpNote: Same format as PID business phone.

Field.Name: Next of Kin / Associated Parties Job Title
Next of Kin / Associated Parties Job Code/Class
Next of Kin / Associated Parties Employee Number

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Class
Field.ImpNote:
"I" - Inpatient Visit, "E" - Emergency Room
Visit, "C" - Clinic Visit
Maps to Big Red Clinic Table or Big Red
Unit/Room/Bed table.

Field.Name: Assigned Patient Location
Field.ImpNote:
Maps to Big Red Clinic Table or Big Red
Unit/Room/Bed table.

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Prior Patient Location
Field.ImpNote:
Only applicable for A02, A06, and A13 (if
location changed). Maps tp Big Red Clinic
Table or Big Red Unit/Room/Bed table

Field.Name: Attending Doctor
Field.ImpNote:
Maps to Big Red Doctor table. Attending
Doctor is filled in on admissions and can
only be modified on a transfer transaction.

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Segment.Name: AL1
Segment.ImpNote:
Only sent on ADD ALLERGY/DELETE
ALLERGY. Contains the allergy to be
added or deleted.

Field.Name: Allergy Type
Field.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Allergy Type table

Field.Name: Allergy Code/Mnemonic/Description
Field.ImpNote:
Maps to BIG RED Allergy Code Table.
Code not required for free text allergies.

Field.Name: Allergy Severity
Field.ImpNote: Maps to BIG RED Severity Table.

Segment.Name: ZRED
Segment.ImpNote:
Contains BIG RED fields not yet addressed
by the HL7 standard.

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
